column1: The Purple Pig////Our first course that arrived was the Whipped Feta. Not knowing what exactly would show up at our table
column2: it was a beautiful display of complex flavors
column3: which included four pillows of light tasty feta
column5: which was a wonderful addition for texture
column6: and drops of puréed dates.  The entire appetizer ("Snack") was wonderful and beautifully presented.
